review_title: Office Culture is Amazing - Office Politics Kills Everything
pros: The people, some of the nicest people you will ever meet with backstories you could write a book about.  My particular position the freedom to create and take on new responsibilities, the flexibility to grow and learn in a way that's comfortable for me, and the support needed from my manager to do the best that I can.
cons: My experience can't be said for 90% of the employees of AlohaCare.  Management is a mess, directors and executives are not in tune with what the employees want and need.  HR attempts to remedy the distrust and unrest in the company, but it all stems from the top.

pros: Not one good thing about AlohaCare. It will make you cry every night.
cons: This is most toxic work environment ever. The people are passive aggressive and rude, they are political and RACIST, the management is literally the worst I have ever had in my 5 professional years of experience. So much compliance issues. CEO does not care about the employees only saving money. No infrastructure you make up as you go and get yelled at for trying. IT's also the most gossipy environment it is worse then high school. The management is the worst gossip of all. If you are a health care professional like myself and you want to be treated fairly, or work with nice normal people, and get paid fairly, then RUN do not walk away from this dump. Youve been warned!

job_title: Help Desk Technician in Honolulu, HI
pros: The staff is caring, supportive, and really easy to get to know. Small company feel that allows you to get to know everyone in the company and make you feel like a part of a whole.
cons: Business practices are shoddy, disorganized and outdated. The company expresses a desire to improve, but balks at making changes.

review_title: Full of corporate BS in a company that can't keep good employees
pros: Great co-workers and supportive manager, CMO
cons: Cannot keep the good employees! Horrible pay, CEO is old and full of excuses as well as cheap. Upper management heavily relies on their "line staff" but treats them like dirt. No employee appreciation or incentive to stay loyal.

pros: Great people to work with, friendly atmosphere.  Flexible hours with opportunities to make-up loss time due to an emergency or unforeseen situation. Bonuses are great.
